```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggExtra)

```

\#Read in Data from Aqua Modis

```{r}
raw_sst <- read_csv(here("/Users", "eisaguirre", "github", "SST", "data", "erdMWsstd3day_LonPM180_8348_2acc_27f9.csv"))


```

# Remove Alt column

```{r}

sst <- raw_sst[-c(2)] 
  
clean_sst <- sst[-c(1),]

final_sst <- clean_sst %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(longitude = as.numeric(clean_sst$longitude))) %>% 
  mutate(data.frame(latitude = as.numeric(clean_sst$latitude)))





```

```{r}

ggplot(final_sst, aes(y=latitude, x=longitude)) +
  geom_raster(aes(fill = sst), show.legend = F, interpolate = T) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "plasma") +
  theme_minimal()
  
  
  

  

```
